name: Marcos Amorim
about:
Backend-focused developer with over 15 years of experience building and supporting production systems.

I specialise in Python, with extensive hands-on experience using Django and Wagtail for complex web platforms, APIs, and CMS-driven applications.

My background includes designing and consuming RESTful APIs, working with PostgreSQL, and setting up CI/CD pipelines using Jenkins and GitHub Actions. I’ve also been responsible for infrastructure and deployments using Docker, Kubernetes, and AWS.

Alongside Django, I’m currently expanding my toolkit with FastAPI, focusing on high-performance, API-first architectures and modern backend patterns.
